oscilloscup

Class BitmapFilePlotter

  • java.lang.Object
    • oscilloscup.DelegPlotter
      • oscilloscup.BitmapFilePlotter

  • public class BitmapFilePlotter
extends DelegPlotter
    The user may want to get an image object or the data of an image file (PNG, JPEG, SVG...) for, for instance, return it to a HTTP-client that will have to draw the image on the web page it will show.

      • getJPEGData

        public byte[] getJPEGData(int width,
                          int height)
        Creates a JPEG-encoded byte array of an image with the given dimension. Warning! The JPEG is format is definitively adapted to photographies, and only photographies. The JPEG image returned by the bitmap image factory will be ugly.
        Parameters:
        width -
        height -
        Returns:
        byte[]
